name: 3D Block Man City Puzzle
description:
3D Block Man City Puzzle is a simple one touch and super exciting jump hopping slide rolling endless run adventure escape game
Features
> Beautiful craft 3D graphics and simple block mine design
> Fun and upbeat soundtrack
> Block bro sprints through the city on his own
> Tap the top to make block bro jump and swing
> Tap the bottom to make block bro slide and roll
